name: Rgge-snake
body:
### Snake, Snake, Snaaakkkkeee's webpage
Snake, Snake, Snaaakkkkeee is a snake like game with a twist. You can shoot parts of you to destroy blocks in front of you.

This game was created for my year 12 major Software project and actually consists of a game engine and the game itself. While the assignment is over I have continued development here: [RGGE-Engine](https://github.com/spanishtech/RGGE-Engine) The new engine includes a complete rework of 90% of the engine and amazing optimizations.
### User manual
The user manual takes the form of the wiki located here: [Wiki](https://github.com/spanishtech/RGGE-snake/wiki)

### Technical manual
The technical manual consists of the javadocs and information is located there to continue this project. Any developer should be able to continue this from the javadocs.

### Download
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
